content.raw:
I had a weird bug where after creating a building, creating a second building had its walls completely messed up in the 3d preview (i.e. orientation and position all wrong) but after finalizing the model (i.e. clicking "Done") they were correct. Upon entering the building editor a third time Gazebo crashed. I have not been able to reproduce this bug though. 

see #388, #389, #390, #391 for other issues.
content.html:
I had a weird bug where after creating a building, creating a second building had its walls completely messed up in the 3d preview (i.e. orientation and position all wrong) but after finalizing the model (i.e. clicking "Done") they were correct. Upon entering the building editor a third time Gazebo crashed. I have not been able to reproduce this bug though.

see #388, #389, #390, #391 for other issues.

update.description:
Finally the building editor is here, and sorry it's going to be a big pull request.

There are already a few known issues reported (issues #360 ~ issue #375)

Outstanding work includes code refactoring, and cleaning up the CSG code which has been implemented but not yet integrated, and I'll file separate tickets for these later.
update.title: Building editor code
